title: David Ortiz Says It’s ‘So Good To Be Retired’ In Oceanside Video
text:
David Ortiz Says It’s ‘So Good To Be Retired’ In Oceanside Video February 19, 2017 6:04 PM Filed Under: David Ortiz , Red Sox David Ortiz. (Photo by Mitchell Layton/Getty Images) 
BOSTON (CBS) – In case you needed even further proof that David Ortiz isn’t changing his mind about retirement , the former Red Sox slugger shared a social media video showing just how much he’s enjoying his post-baseball life. 
Last week Hanley Ramirez joked that if Ortiz comes back, missing Ramirez will be one of the reasons. Ortiz joked in a tweet to WBZ-TV’s Dan Roche that “I’m not playing baseball anymore.” @RochieWBZ yes bro my boy is so right😊.But lm not playing baseball anymore 🙂 
— David Ortiz (@davidortiz) February 16, 2017 
On Sunday, Ortiz shared a video from the beach that proves he isn’t missing the grind of spring training very much. My spring training 😎 pic.twitter.com/6efcdohjlJ 
— David Ortiz (@davidortiz) February 19, 2017 
“So good to be retired. At the beach … This is my spring training. How about that? Enjoy. See you when I see you,” Ortiz said with a laugh. 
Sorry Red Sox fans. Looks like yet another piece of evidence that Ortiz is a man of his word.
